data.name: Sport Spinning Trout Pack
data.detailed_description:
Sport Spinning Trout Pack is a true champion’s choice when it comes to any tournament or competition that involves catching some mighty Trout! This energized selection of sportfishing tackle includes the super Sports Edition of the Aurora 8' 2" spinning rod and Prima 2500 spinning reel that are twice as strong and durable as their predecessors! Not to mention that you also get some of the sturdiest line, a set of hooks, baits and other goodies fit for a real sportfishing champion!
We put a lot of thought into assembling this Sport Spinning Trout Pack, so that you wouldn't have to! ;)
Sport Spinning Trout Pack is all about becoming a real Trout fishing champion! It includes:

20 BAITCOINS use to purchase advanced fishing tackle, available only for Baitcoins.
Spend your Baitcoins wisely!

SPORTY RODS ‘N REELS
Rod:
Sports Edition Aurora 8' 2"

Reel:
Sports Edition Prima 2500

TERMINAL TACKLE - a selection of float tackle that you’ll need if you want to enjoy your trout fishing competition to the fullest!

Spinners: Barbless Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz., #1/0 (X3)
Spoons: Barbless Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz, #1/0 (X2)
Jig Heads: Barbless JigHead 1/6 Oz, #1/0; Barbless JigHead 1/4 Oz, #1; Barbless JigHead 1/3 Oz, #2/0;
Jig Baits: Grub 2", Grub 3", Shad 2", Shad 3"

Line: Flur .011"

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64, Mac OS X
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2 GHz 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
